entries.text: Hello! My name is Jordan. Nice to meet you.
entries.speaker: Jordan

entries.text: Hello Jordan! I'm Minji. Nice to meet you too.
entries.speaker: Minji

entries.text: No, I'm an office worker. What about you?
entries.speaker: Minji

entries.text: I am a college student. I'm studying Korean.
entries.speaker: Jordan

entries.text: Wow, that's great! Korean is a bit difficult, isn't it?
entries.speaker: Minji

entries.text: Yes, it's difficult but fun. Please help me a lot.
entries.speaker: Jordan

entries.text: Thank you. See you next time!
entries.speaker: Jordan
